item.title: UX Design Team Resources
item.description: Toolkits & Playbooks Bixal Methods Toolkit A collection of tools to bring human-centered design into your project. Bixal CX Toolkit Bixal’s CX Toolkit briefly outlines the objectives, methods and roles needed to bring a CX perspective to the solutions we deliver to federal agencies. These are provided at a “framework” level. U.S. Digital Services Playbook The Digital Services Playbook identifies a series of “plays” drawn from successful best practices from the private sector and government that, if followed together, will help government build effective digital services.
